Package Projects

Class Registration

java.lang.Object
Projects.Form
Projects.Registration
public class Registration extends Form
The Registration class represents a registration for a project. It extends the Form class and includes additional attributes and methods specific to registrations.
Since:
2025-04-23

  • Constructor Details

    • Registration

      public Registration(Integer id, Project project, Users.Officer officer, LocalDate registrationDate, String formStatus)
      Constructor for Registration class
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the registration.
      project - The project related to this registration.
      officer - The officer who processed the registration.
      registrationDate - The date when the registration was made.
      formStatus - The status of the form (e.g., Pending, Approved, Rejected).

    • viewRegistrations

      public static List<Registration> viewRegistrations(List<Registration> registrationList, Users.User user)
      Filters the list of registrations based on the user's role.
      Parameters:
      registrationList - The list of registrations to filter.
      user - The user whose role is used to filter the registrations.
